          <title>
            <string language="en">Gravitational potential energy and height</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Mögliche Gravitationsenergie und Höhe</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Énergie et taille potentielles de la gravité</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Energia e altura potenciais gravitacionais</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Energia ed altezza potenziali gravitazionali</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Βαρύτητας πιθανά ενέργεια και ύψος</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Energía y altura potenciales gravitacionales</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">This illustration shows the relationship of the gravitational potential energy of an object and its height.</string>
          </description>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">height</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">gravitational potential energy</string>

          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Diese Abbildung zeigt das Verhältnis der 
möglichen Gravitationsenergie einer Nachricht und seiner Höhe.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Cette illustration montre le rapport de 
l'énergie potentielle de la gravité d'un objet et de sa taille.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Esta ilustração mostra o relacionamento da 
energia potencial gravitacional de um objeto e de sua altura.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questa illustrazione mostra il rapporto 
dell'energia potenziale gravitazionale di un oggetto e della relativa 
altezza.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτή η απεικόνιση εμφανίζει τη σχέση της βαρύτητας 
πιθανής ενέργειας ενός αντικειμένου και του ύψους της.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Esta ilustración muestra el lazo de la energía 
potencial gravitacional de un objeto y de su altura.</string>
          </description>
